values: i am no longer a video game virgin...i just beat zelda twilight princess...this is what comes from injuring yourself on the job.  at the end i was screaming 'die, fucker, die!'
melanie, this diva thing is freakin' amazing....after ya get the hang of it..lol
since all requests for a phone number and/or mailing adress have been ignored, the my faves cell phone i had planned to give to cera has now been donated to a local shelter.

this is my cousin's kid....something nice amidst all the doom and gloom.

i was just reading through some old journal entries...can't believe i'ts been TWO years since i wrote this...and i'm STILL totally in drooling, mindblowing lust!..now..if we didn't live so far apart :(

ok, now i've announced that...whew...i'm going to bed!

for anyone that still actually reads this journal...i'm moving to birmingham on june 15!!
i got a full time xray job at a hospital there...mon-fri days and no weekends, ever!  yay!!
i am now officially a registered tech..i got my scores in today...a 96, yay for me!!!!!
i saw a person die tonight

i got a student tech job at the hospital!!!  i will be making like three times as much money as i do now, and working less!  i'll get every other weekend off!!..this could mean a real possibility of getting to homecoming this year..woo hooo!  and best of all.....I"LL NEVER HAVE TO CASHIER EVAR AGAIN!!!!!!!
this time next weekend i'll be radiating old people for MONEY...my life is complete

i just read an alumni listerve about move in day....it made me want to be back at the W so bad it hurts!  i've thought about moving back to columbus when i finish up school again...but i know it wouldn't be the same...only a few people that i know would be around, and none of us would be in school....*snifs*  just ignore me, i'm feeling all hormonal and i need a W fix!
this alum was suprised about the toilet paper situation...made me smile remembering how we used to get every single person in the suite to go by and get the rationed two rolls...and her daughter was practicing for freshman seranade *sighs*  to be on the jones balcony jingling my keys!  *well, not jones anymore, i know.....but it was when i was there!*  i even want to go to a display!  I WANT TO SING, can anyone belive it?  doesn't that glove get annoying?  save gas, fly poptart air!  i need me some fawdil! i want to play in the flooded street in front of the library, wade through a fountain, smash mutant roaches in front of martin!   i want to hop in katie's old civic and play the 'lets get lost' game.  does anyone want to smoke?  i will keep you company on the back steps!  the lock and dam is calling my name...i feel the urge to hit myself and compare the bruise.  *sighs*  i will probably never use my degree from the W, but i would NEVER trade my time there....
*goes off to look at her yearbooks*

for all who are interested...i got laid..again...*big cheesy grin*
ask me how many times...i dare ya!
as i told my little this weekend..i am totally in lust.

i would just like to say...damn...d.a.m.n.
i am totally and completely sexually satisfied...best EVER.
ok, now i've announced that...whew...i'm going to bed!

Ten Reasons to Love an X-ray Tech
1. We do our best work in the dark
2. We can see through your clothes
3. We know all the positions
4. We are well developed
5. The chemistry is always right
6. We know what buttons to push
7. We have all the right techniques
8. We know how to warm up a tube
9. We know how to get the best penetration
10. When you need it now, we make it wet

so..i purchased a new cd today..the darkness 'permission to land'  anybody that knows me knows i love aerosmith and queen..the darkness is like a mix between the two.  anyway..it was from wal mart..so it was edited..i should have known better...
one of my favorite songs is "givin' up"  it's just got a really catchy tune, even though the lyrics are all about shooting up with heroine..anwyays..the chorus goes:
givin' up, givin' up, givin' a fuck
the edited version goes:
givin' up, givin' up gettin' it up

hmm...sexual disfuncion, or the f word?  you decide

gahhh!  i'm so fuckin pissed!
so, you all know matt and i broke up or whatever.  more like just i moved out really.  anyway, i went over there on sunday and we watched a movie and then rode around and looked at hwy 90 cause they just opened it back up.
so, today was his day off, he was supposed to come over here to see me.  the thing is, when we first started dating, i ALWAYS went over to his apartment.  so, i call him at about 5..he woke up at 2 this afternoon *he's working 6 pm til 6am* his excuse was that he had to wait til 5 to hear about his car..ok..but he said he wasn't coming over, he was tired...*#*&(*^$#&$*(%  its' ok for me to drive 40 minutes over there, though.  i dunno..it hurt my feelings cause it's like..well, i don't want to get off my ass to come see you, but you can drive over here to me. do i or do i not have a right to be pissed?  it's not like we were going to go out or anything.  we were going to do the same thing he's doing at home..hang out, watch tv, maybe rent a movie..gaaahhhhh!!
he said maybe we can do something on monday after he gets off work..i was like..yeah, you'll be too tired on monday too.  if he comes over here then, he better be armed with some flowers and dinner out or something!

matt and i are broken up.  perhaps temporarily, perhaps not.
lots of little things built up.  we are taking a break from each other.
i am living at my parent's again.  that sucks, just because i feel like such a loser, not because i absolutely hate it here or anything.
i have cried so much today, i don't think i have any tears left.

so, i'm driving to class on I10 this morning..and what do i see?
a pimped out dark green buick, rims, dark tinted glass, the works...with the word 'salazar' printed in old english letters on the back window..i kid you not.  there was also what suspiciously looked like two snakes entwined with each other underneath it.  apparently there is a homie out there that loves him some harry potter.

Memes are a way to get something in a journal without writing it yourself.

If you read this, if your eyes are passing over this right now, even if we don't speak often, please post a comment with a memory of you and me. It can be anything you want, either good or bad, or possibly illegal.

When you're finished, post this little paragraph on your journal to see what people remember about you.

i guess i don't have a whole lot to report..school is going great, i am looking to have another 4.0 this semester *something i never had at the w, hee hee*  but that was my fault..i just wasn't that motivated.
everyone else seems to have much more entertaining lives, as far as lj goes.  i go to work, i go to school..other than the potato chip incident, nothing interesting has happened.
there was a lady the other day..in for a femur/hip series..she asked this guy in my class, david, if he would talk dirty to her..that was amusing.
i can't blame her, though..david is hot hot hot...bald, built...and those piercing eyes...you know how john's are, melanie?.like that.
if i weren't happily attatched....but, no harm in looking.  you can't tell me men don't look..that's ok, as long as they don't touch.
oh, and i told a patient i was going to feel him up the other day..not like that, though!  i was just warning him that i would be feeling around for his hip bone...i'ts a very important geographical spot..lol
anyways..that's my update!

cause i know where to find one!..LOL
so, i'm minding my own business at work today, happily filling up the napkin despensers when the potato chip vendor just up and informs me that yeah, he's got several part time jobs..this one, and he fixes houses, and oh, he just started dancing again recently.  i was like "dancing?"  never in my most horrible nightmares would i have guessed he would say what he did...
"yeah, for ladies' parties" *in a stage whisper*..at this point i was trying to pick my jaw up off the floor...he proceeded to tell me that the most he'd ever danced for was a party of 39 "all these women staring at me, and i didn't have a stitch of clothes on"
let me clarify for those of you who are getting lavicious thoughts...NO one, and i mean NO ONE would want to see this guy naked..ever..no matter what kind of cash or chemical inducement was involved.
later i asked my boss if i just looked like i needed a good lap dance, and was that why he thought he needed to tell me about his "job"

life is hectic...clinic is fun!

sleepy, sleepy.
clinic was pretty good today.  i only have two minimal assists left on a portable chest and i can comp on it..then i can do them by myself.
i did well on my physics test also.  have another one on thursday.  math is confusing, but i'll figure it out.  i have another test on monday and a take home test due tomorrow...blah.
just got back from wal mart with matt.  grocery shopping sucks!
very tired, going to bed.
later!

i'm such a good girl..updating again, already!
clinic today was pretty cool.  it was busier, and i got to do two of my minimal assists on a portable chest xray.  i think they're easier, cause you don't have to get the people out of bed to do them.  that, and i get to drive the nifty portable machine :)
some lady with a titanium hip asked cute bald david from my class to talk dirty to her today.  they were waiting for the tech to process her films *which is really code for scan the film now, cause everything is digital* and he said he'd wait around and talk to her til the tech got back.  she proceeded to ask him to talk dirty to her..hee hee
hmm..what else? the ring 2 isn't as good as the first one.  not nearly as scary.  
ehh..guess that's it, i should get off the computer and go study for my radium physics test that i have on thursday..yay.  wish i'd taken physics in high school now.
later!

ok, so i was informed at rush a couple weekends ago that i need to update.  this is for you kim :)
everything is fine here after katrina.  power came back on a week after the storm, and i praised god, allah, goddesses, and whoever else was listening.  
i went back to class this past week, and started back to clinic.  let me tell you, singing river hospital has got to be the most boring place on earth.  i saw a total of 5 xrays in the 8 hours we were there last tuesday.  thursday was even worse.  i did get to do my very first chest series on a real person on thursday, though.  yay!
other than that, life is getting back to semi-normal.  
i just got back from blockbuster, and as soon as matt gets out of the shower we're going to watch the ring 2 and finding neverland.  
only about a month and a half til harry potter comes out!!!!
guess that's all people...later!

so, i haven't posted in a long while.  life is hectic.  that is putting it mildly.  i've decided that i'm not going to sleep for the next two years...but in the end, it'll be worth it.  and i LOVE RT school.
i cannot express how excited i am about school.  when i was at the w, yeah, i loved THE school, and the people, and campus life.  but i didn't love my classes or my major.  don't get me wrong, i enjoyed my art classes, but they weren't something i came home and talked about, or got excited over.
i had my birthday on sunday, the day before.  i have class all day on mondays, litterally, so we celebrated on sunday.  my mom got me a preordered copy of harry potter, so i don't really get that until july.  matt got me a cd player for my car.  i got it installed today on my lunch break.
anyways..i guess that's the extent of my news for now.  i miss my jenna and my melanie!

i am the proud new owner of a 2003 hyundai elantra!!!!!
it's dark purple/grey..sometimes looks purple, sometimes looks grey, five speed stick shift, four doors, neat little clicker thingie so i don't have to use a key!!!
it's BEAUTIFUL!!!
as soon as i get a picture of it, i'm gonna post!

i'm here in the computer lab..waiting for my class to start.  i'm still waiting on word aobut the job at the police dept.  i called them yesterday, they are still running background checks.  in the meantime, i've applied for a job in the deli at the gas station beside matt's apartment complex.  that will get me some money while i wait/look for something better.  i talked to the lady this morning..when she found out that i was spending most of my time just next door, instead of at home 20 miles away, she sounded much more enthusiastic, and promised to call me.  
i finally took my midterm in a&p yesterday.  hopefully that will reduce my stress level.  i've been having stomach aches and i got a stress induced cold sore.  i know it's not good for me, but hell if i know how to relieve some of it.  i've thought about finding a gun range and shooting something.
a week from tomorrow i go for my orientation for the radiology interview.  i'm supposed to dress up..but then follow a radiologist around a hospital and observe...some of this stuff could be yucky too..the sheet said something about a surgical something or other.  and i'm supposed to do this in heels and makeup?
i need to get on the ball and do my research into this stuff...i dont' know if they contact the person that i follow around, but i want to at least have some idea of what i'm supposed to be observing.

i got an interview for radiology school!!!!!!!!!!
the letter came today.
i have to follow a rad tech around for three hours on the 16th of march, and then my interview is the 23rd!!!!!
i also pulled an 'A' in anatomy and physiology for midterm!

so..i got my fingerprints taken today!  they finally found that body...hehe..nah, just kidding.
i had to get my fingerprints taken for that job app i'm filling out...for those of you out there that have never been arrested, they don't use ink anymore!  i was so disappointed!  it really was neat, though...i guess if i had thought about it, it would have occured to me that they would scan my fingers into a computer.

so..i'm filling out a job application for the city of biloxi...it's to be a data entry clerk at the biloxi police department.  these people are serious about their employees...the application is HUGE.  i have to go get my fingerprints done and give them a photocopy of everything ever since birth.  but..if i got it it would be a cool job...evenings and weekends..almost 10 bucks and hour..29 hours a week...they consider that full time for some weird reason, so i might even get benefits :)  
i just sent off my fafsa application.  hopefully i can get some summer money.  i'm going to wait until they have my 2004/05 app processed before i apply for 2005/06.  i've never gotten a pell grant before..but i'm considered independent now..and i'm poor!
guess that's my news for now...later!

so, it's monday!  it seems like forever ago it was friday, but in a good way :)  matt and i went and saw 'constantine' on friday night.  we got there late and so had we had to sit in the very first row.  the people look really funny on screen when you're that close.  it was still a good movie, though.  then we ended up going to the movies again last night.  matt's friend anthony and his wife invited us to go see 'boogeyman' in gulfport.  that was a freaky movie!..it's one of those scary movies where they don't show a lot of stuff, but it's really sudden and loud..an 'oh shit!' movie.  i was tense and on the edge of my seat through the whole thing.
after the movie we went by gloria's house *a friend of matt's, he might be moving into her house when he gets outta the military to save on rent*  it was decided that all of his huge furniture would fit in her house.  i had to laugh...she said she asked him the same thing i did when she first met him..are you sure you aren't gay?  all his furniture matches and coordinates with the couches and the rugs.  and he's particular about the way things are arranged and put away..he claims it's all the years he's been in the military.
anyways..that's about all my news for now...i've got an A&P test to study for.
isn't it cute?

well..still knee deep in how to get matt graduated and comissioned....i might be coming to the columbus/starkville area this weekend, though!  he's gotta talk wtih some guy from state's rotc, and he's trying to get it set up for sunday afternoon so we can come up together!!!..yay for w visits!
if it weren't for the fact that i have a test in anatomy and physiology on monday, i'd skip class and we would go then, cause monday is president's day and matt's off work.
another blah...the mean colonel said matt's gotta quit his part time job cause of the training thing.  at least he admitted that he'd been working hard on it, though.  the colonel needs to suck some old moldy green donkey dicks.
anyways...i've got my fingers crossed about a visit to columbus!..i miss all my people up there!

well, i'm still alive!  i've felt like complete shit for the last couple of days.  
i talked to matt yesterday..the assignment was not a mistake..if he takes it he goes to japan for three years..and if he declines he gets outta the af in june...which would mean having a job by then that pays enough to get his bills outta the way. *as marie will tell you, rent in biloxi is not cheap*  he's been looking at civil service jobs on the net.  one in florida and one in nevada :(  this really sucks big green donkey dicks.  i definately don't want him moving to japan..but nevada is almost as bad.
well, gotta go..need to get my accounting homework done before i leave for gautier

arrgghhh..i have the funk...and this time it isn't due to my little *winks* i love you lil!  how is it that you can't breathe through your nose..but it can still drip and run and trot and skip? i'm gonna have my sinuses removed.
on top of feeling like shit somebody stepped in, i got some bad news yesterday.  apparently, the air force feels the need to have matt in japan five months before he's scheduled to get out.  he got an assignment yesterday that he has to respond to by the 21st.  the options are declining it and possibly staying in biloxi til nov, like was the plan.  declining it and getting out earlier *also not a good thing, he's gotta find a good job before he gets out*  accepting it and going to japan for five months..two of which will be spent on terminal leave cause he's got that many vacation days stored up...or...going to japan for three years.  that's what the assignment said..three years...i'm thinking/hoping that it was a big boo boo.  why send somebody to japan for what would essentially be three months?..it makes no sense.  grrrrrr..he's going to call somebody and inquire about the situation today.

ok,..so, i made an A on my anatomy and physiology test!..woo hoo!  there were only two A's in the whole class.
but..blah..i got to school at 8:30 this morning..go to my accounting class and see a note on the door that said class was canceled.  and since my 10:00 class was having an online day, i had shit to do until 1:00.  if i had only checked my email before i left the house!  i tried to work on my webpage, but, as usual, pc's suck, the w server wouldn't let me upload files using dos, and the lab computers didn't have a graphic interface ftp client.  i'll just have to wait til i get home to my mac to work on anything. it's werid how i have access to my own webpage files from my computer at home, but my access is restricted when i try to upload using dos...blah!
here's a picture of my sweetie...it's not the best in the world, but i hope to get some more soon :)

ok,..so, it's been a while since i've written in this thing...a LONG while.  i'm going to try an be better, i promise.
anyways...so, i'm back in school again.  at the junior college here on the coast.  trying to get into radiology school.  they only accept 25 people, though..so if that doesn't work out, i'm gonna learn how to bill people's insurance..work in a medical office, basically.  i actually really enjoy all of my classes.  except word processing..the teacher is a bitch in that one, and i'm bored stiff.  i'm taking anatomy and physiology this semester too, in hopes for rad. school.  that class is very interesting, but extreamely difficult..i have my first lab quiz on monday, and i'm sooo prepared for it.  go on..ask me what path the blood takes through the heart..i dare ya..i know it all!
i really think i should have majored in nursing at the w, instead of my useful art degree.  oh well, i can't regret my years there.  
i have a new sweetie..we've been dating for almost two months now, and he's great :)  i haven't found anything majorly wrong with him yet.  marie has met him, and she gives her approval, so that means he's nice :)  he's also a hottie.
oh well, that's all for now...maybe i'll get some responses and be able to keep up with people better with this thing.

ps..somebody tell me how to post pictures on here?..please?
